p: To examine the transcriptional changes induced by Hh pathway activation in detail, we dissociated and analyzed freshly flow cytometry-sorted stromal and epithelial fractions of M6-Ctrl and M6-Hh tumors ± SMOi using RNA-Sequencing (RNA-Seq) (Fig. 1a). Differential gene expression analysis confirmed effective cellular fractionation, with Hh transgene expression restricted to the epithelial cell population while Hh target genes Ptch, Gli1, and Hhip expression were induced solely in the stromal fraction of M6-Hh tumors (Supplementary Data 1).
